channel.title: Disconnection when custom npc is in region

item.title: Disconnection when custom npc is in region
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Well, I managed to add a custom NPC. However, the problem is that it disconnects if the NPC is within the map region.

Here are the ints:

		if(i == 3794){
			class5.aStringArray66 = new String[6];
			class5.aStringArray66[2] = "Talk to";
			class5.aStringArray66[3] = "What's new";
			class5.anIntArray76 = new int[0];
			class5.anIntArray70 = new int[0];
			class5.anIntArray94 = new int[1]; // npc
			class5.anIntArray94[1] = 3670; // npc
			class5.aString65 = "Event Guy";
			class5.aByteArray89 = "Hmm. I wonder what is new today.".getBytes();
		}

And yes, the npcâ€™s model id is 3670.

EDIT: I managed to get it to work, however it just shows a nulled head.

		if(i == 3794){
			class5.aStringArray66 = new String[6];
			class5.aStringArray66[2] = "Talk to";
			class5.aStringArray66[3] = "What's new";
			class5.anIntArray76 = new int[0];
			class5.anIntArray70 = new int[0];
			class5.anIntArray94 = new int[1]; // npc
			class5.anIntArray94[1] = 3794; // npc
			class5.aString65 = "Event Guy";
			class5.aByteArray89 = "Hmm. I wonder what is new today.".getBytes();
		}

Yes, my model id is 3794.

EDIT2: Nvm, fixed.
